arts.ttl: 'A lot of pressure' - but how costly will Cunha's red card prove?
arts.sum: The Brazil forward was sent off late in extra time as Wolves were knocked out of the FA Cup by Bournemouth on penalties. But how costly will his dismissal be for the club's Premier League survival?

arts.ttl: Semi-automatic offside tech fail ‘not a good sign’ as Iraola fumes at seven-minute delay
arts.sum: Bournemouth boss Andoni Iraola says it’s “not a good sign” for semi-automatic offside technology (SAOT) after it took VAR seven minutes to review a goal on Saturday. The Cherries advanced to the quarter-finals of the FA Cup as they beat ten-man Wolves on penalties at Dean Court, but the game was not without controversy. arts.ttl: Wolves star Matheus Cunha sent off in moment of madness as his side crash out of FA Cup
arts.sum: Mateus Cunha faces a four-match ban after being sent off for violent conduct against Bournemouth, having lost his head by appearing to hit and headbutt Milos Kerkez in Wolves' FA Cup defeat

arts.ttl: Cunha sees red & VAR outrage! Bournemouth's dramatic shoot-out win over Wolves
arts.sum: Matheus Cunha was sent off in extra-time for an apparent headbutt as Wolves lost to Bournemouth in a rollercoaster FA Cup tie that ended in sudden-death penalties.

arts.ttl: Sinisterra penalty secures Bournemouth's quarter-final place
arts.sum: Watch the moment Bournemouth's Luis Sinisterra secures his side a place in the quarter-finals of The FA Cup as he scores the winning penalty against Wolverhampton Wanderers.
